data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jelle Vossen (Zulte) has replaced the possibly injured Tomas Chory.
In the minute 36, Zulte's Gianni Bruno scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Jelle Vossen with an assist there.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Bosuilstadion.
Manuel Benson is replacing Martin Hongla for Antwerp at Bosuilstadion.
Damien Marcq (Zulte) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 54, It seems as if Ritchie De Laet is unable to continue. Nana Opoku Ampomah replaces him for the home team.
Zulte's Laurens De Bock has been booked in Antwerp.
Ivan Leko is making the team's third substitution at Bosuilstadion with Alexis De Sart replacing Lior Refaelov.
In the minute 70, Alexis De Sart is booked for the home team.
Daniel Opare (Zulte) gets a yellow card.
Nana Opoku Ampomah (Antwerp) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Abdoulaye Sissako is replacing Gianni Bruno for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Olivier Deschacht, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ewoud Pletinckx is the substitute for Zulte.
